snippet: Takashi Ueno, a young Japanese dancer, provided one of the breathtaking moments in the work he performed with the choreographer Raimund Hoghe.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews American premiere of Raimund Hoghe piece Pas de Deux, performed by Hoghe and Takashi Ueno at the Baryshnikov Arts Center as part of the Crossing the Line festival.
lead_paragraph: Takashi Ueno, a young Japanese dancer, provided one of the breathtaking moments in the work he performed with the choreographer Raimund Hoghe.

headline.seo: Raimund Hoghe and Takashi Ueno in ‘Pas de Deux’
headline.main: Reconceiving Partnering With a Dose Of Politics
headline.print_headline: Reconceiving Partnering With a Dose Of Politics
